name: First "Game"
description:
This is my first 2D Platformer in godot made by watching some tutorials on youtube!  I plan to add more stuff to the game such as (collectabel coins) a healthbar and enemies and more. Let's see how much of the above named stuff I'll be able to actually implement ingame x).

UPDATE 1 (as of 22.12.2022)

Added own player animations to the game, a camera that follows the player and a background.

UPDATE 2 (as of 23.12.2022)

Added collectable coins to the game, a counter that displays the amount of collected coins and also added a "parallax" effect to the background so it looks like it is further away from the player and platforms.

UPDATE 3 (as of 24.12.2022)

Added a Main Menu, "YOU WIN" Screen and an actual goal to the game. Win the game by collecting 5 coins. Added sprint feature.

UPDATE 4 (as of 25.12.2022)

Added a feature that respawns the player if he falls off a  cliff.  Added a countdown that displays your time once you win. Adjusted the speed of the camera to better fit the players speed. Backend improvements (clean code). Updated the main menu explaining the controls. Player art changed, credits aka5006. Changed player hitbox to better fit ingame.
